name: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Bobble Battles
name_original: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Bobble Battles
description: Your favorite cartoon is now an epic game! From the attack on the Northern Water Tribe to the siege of Ba Sin Se, it's up to you to decide the outcome of your favorite battles as you command the armies of the Water Tribe, Earth Nation, and even the Fire Nation in this unique strategy game! Fun for the whole family.
